about_this_item: Visible Results: With regular use, this neck firming cream helps firming skin for a more youthful and revitalized appearance.
Firming: Our Neck Cream is specifically formulated to help firm skin, providing a youthful appearance.
Easy to Apply: The smooth and creamy formula of our skin firming cream for the face and neck is easy to apply and absorbs quickly into your skin.
Safe and Effective: Made with healthy ingredients, our neck cream is safe and effective, and free from formula additives.
Smooth and Hydrate: This neck firming cream is rich in nourishing ingredients that hydrate and smooth your skin, leaving it feeling soft and supple.

title: Verified Purchase
content: I'm a throat cancer survivor and had really harsh radiation therapy applied to my neck. I survived the cancer but my neck suffered real damage. The skin is wrinkled and creased. I wanted very much to find a solution that would improve matters. I stumbled upon this cream and thought it might work, so I ordered it. Good! Immediately on application, I can see a short term tightening of the fine wrinkles and it has ingredients that are reported to improve skin texture over the long haul. So far, I am very happy. It's good to have something turn out right in your life after fighting through this major episode.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2024
